description: Least number coprime to n and n+1.
comments: A179675(n) = smallest m such that a(m) = n-th odd prime. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 23 2010
links: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[n_] := For[k = 3, True, k++, If[CoprimeQ[k, n, n+1], Return[k]]]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 101}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Sep 20 2012 *)
prog: (Haskell)a053670 n = head [x | x <- [3, 5 ..],                      n `gcd` x == 1, (n + 1) `gcd` x == 1]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 28 2012(PARI) a(n)=my(N=n*(n+1),k=2); while(gcd(k++,N)>1,); k \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 10 2015
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 15 2000
extensions: More terms from Andrew Gacek (andrew(AT)dgi.net), Feb 21 2000 and _James A. Sellers_, Feb 22 2000.
